experiences.subtitle: Deep Learning
workDescription: During my IIT Roorkee Summer Research Internship under Dr. Kamal Jain, I contributed to developing an advanced Annotation Tool for Semantic Segmentation using META's Segment Anything model. Collaborating with a talented team, I actively participated in all project stages, deepening my understanding of computer vision and machine learning. This hands-on experience allowed me to make meaningful contributions to the field, drive innovation, and hone my technical skills.
